plot outline: In a village called Kalathur Gramam, located in the small town of Pattukkottai, which in turn is located in the Thanjavur district of Tamil Nadu, lives a pair of father and son. They have been in a dispute with each other, however, for three long decades, starting from the 1970s until the 1990s.
title: Kalathur Gramam
plot: In a village called _Kalathur Gramam_ (qv), located in the small town of Pattukkottai, which in turn is located in the Thanjavur district of Tamil Nadu, lives a pair of father and son. They have been in a dispute with each other, however, for three long decades, starting from the 1970s until the 1990s.
